channel.title: Venezuela on Noah Mazer
channel.description: Recent content in Venezuela on Noah Mazer

item.title: Ludovico Silva - Yesterday I Saw a Camel Go By
item.description: [Ayer Vi Pasar Un Camello] Yesterday I saw a camel, drunk, carrying a book and cursing pass by my window. And I would’ve been shocked if, after the camel, a man hadn’t passed by all starched and happy on his way to work.

item.title: Miguel James - AGAINST THE POLICE
item.description: [CONTRA LA POLICÍA] All of my Work is against the police. If I write a Love poem it’s against the police. And if I sing to the nakedness of bodies I sing against the police. And if I make this Earth a metaphor I make a metaphor against the police. If I talk crazy in this poem I’m talking against the police. And if I manage to create a poem it’s against the police.
